Wizard Sinina
Released26 January 2005 (Update)

RaceHuman

ExamineA Supplier of Magical robes.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID3249

Wizard Sinina sells mystic robes and other mystic equipment in the Wizards' Guild through the mystic robes store. He is located on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of the guild, next to Wizard Akutha.

If a player has achieved 99 Magic, they can purchase a magic cape and its respective hood from him for 99,000 coins.

Level 66 Magic is required to access the Wizards' Guild, where Wizard Sinina resides.

Magic cape[edit | edit source]

If a player has 99 Magic, they will have access to a duplicate version of the shop, with the only difference being the addition of the Magic cape. The stock of this shop is not shared with the regular shop.

ItemNumber
in stock		Restock

sold at		Price
bought at		GE
price
Magic cape10.6s 99,000N/ANot sold

Magic cape(t)[edit | edit source]

For players with 99 Magic and at least one other 99, they will access a second duplicate shop. Just like the previous, the stock of this shop is not shared with the others.
